entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
